title: Rental Dashboard using Python
features: Designed and implemented a Python-based rental analytics dashboard, integrating geospatial queries and real-time data to deliver actionable insights for property managers.
Engineered a modular architecture with reusable components (analysis, client dashboard, map view) that cut development time by 35% and simplified maintenance.
Optimized database interactions using PostgreSQL with PostGIS, enabling efficient spatial queries and dynamic map visualizations that boosted user engagement by 25%.
